dn1:1.3.1: Atha kho sambahulanam bhikkhunam rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthitanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayam sankhiyadhammo udapadi:
dn1:1.3.2: “acchariyam, avuso, abbhutam, avuso, yavancidam tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sattanam nanadhimuttikata suppatividita.
dn1:1.3.3: Ayanhi suppiyo paribbajako anekapariyayena buddhassa avannam bhasati, dhammassa avannam bhasati, sanghassa avannam bhasati;
dn1:1.3.4: suppiyassa pana paribbajakassa antevasi brahmadatto manavo anekapariyayena buddhassa vannam bhasati, dhammassa vannam bhasati, sanghassa vannam bhasati.
dn1:1.3.5: Itihame ubho acariyantevasi annamannassa ujuvipaccanikavada bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandha honti bhikkhusanghanca”ti.
dn1:1.4.1: Atha kho bhagava tesam bhikkhunam imam sankhiyadhammam viditva yena mandalamalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi. Nisajja kho bhagava bhikkhu amantesi:
dn1:1.4.2: “kaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaya sannisinna sannipatita, ka ca pana vo antarakatha vippakata”ti?
dn1:1.4.3: Evam vutte, te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn1:1.4.4: “idha, bhante, amhakam rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthitanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayam sankhiyadhammo udapadi:
dn1:1.4.5: ‘acchariyam, avuso, abbhutam, avuso, yavancidam tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sattanam nanadhimuttikata suppatividita.
dn1:1.4.6: Ayanhi suppiyo paribbajako anekapariyayena buddhassa avannam bhasati, dhammassa avannam bhasati, sanghassa avannam bhasati;
dn1:1.4.7: suppiyassa pana paribbajakassa antevasi brahmadatto manavo anekapariyayena buddhassa vannam bhasati, dhammassa vannam bhasati, sanghassa vannam bhasati.
dn1:1.4.8: Itihame ubho acariyantevasi annamannassa ujuvipaccanikavada bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandha honti bhikkhusanghanca’ti.
dn1:1.4.9: Ayam kho no, bhante, antarakatha vippakata, atha bhagava anuppatto”ti.
dn1:1.5.1: “Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare avannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va avannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va avannam bhaseyyum, tatra tumhehi na aghato na appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaniya.
dn1:1.5.2: Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare avannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va avannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va avannam bhaseyyum, tatra ce tumhe assatha kupita va anattamana va, tumham yevassa tena antarayo.
dn1:1.5.3: Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare avannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va avannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va avannam bhaseyyum, tatra ce tumhe assatha kupita va anattamana va, api nu tumhe paresam subhasitam dubbhasitam ajaneyyatha”ti?
dn1:1.6.1: “Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare avannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va avannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va avannam bhaseyyum, tatra tumhehi abhutam abhutato nibbethetabbam:
dn1:1.6.2: ‘itipetam abhutam, itipetam ataccham, natthi cetam amhesu, na ca panetam amhesu samvijjati’ti.
dn1:1.6.3: Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare vannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va vannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va vannam bhaseyyum, tatra tumhehi na anando na somanassam na cetaso uppilavitattam karaniyam.
dn1:1.6.4: Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare vannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va vannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va vannam bhaseyyum, tatra ce tumhe assatha anandino sumana uppilavita tumham yevassa tena antarayo.
dn1:1.6.5: Mamam va, bhikkhave, pare vannam bhaseyyum, dhammassa va vannam bhaseyyum, sanghassa va vannam bhaseyyum, tatra tumhehi bhutam bhutato patijanitabbam:
dn1:1.6.6: ‘itipetam bhutam, itipetam taccham, atthi cetam amhesu, samvijjati ca panetam amhesu’ti.
dn1:1.7.1: Appamattakam kho panetam, bhikkhave, oramattakam silamattakam, yena puthujjano tathagatassa vannam vadamano vadeyya.

dn1:1.8.2: iti va hi, bhikkhave, puthujjano tathagatassa vannam vadamano vadeyya.
dn1:1.8.3: ‘Adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato samano gotamo dinnadayi dinnapatikankhi, athenena sucibhutena attana viharati’ti—
dn1:1.8.4: iti va hi, bhikkhave, puthujjano tathagatassa vannam vadamano vadeyya.

dn1:1.9.4: iti va hi, bhikkhave, puthujjano tathagatassa vannam vadamano vadeyya.

dn1:1.9.6: iti va hi, bhikkhave, puthujjano tathagatassa vannam vadamano vadeyya.

dn1:3.21.2: ‘atthi kho, bho, eso atta, yam tvam vadesi, neso natthiti vadami;
dn1:3.21.3: no ca kho, bho, ayam atta ettavata paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti.
dn1:3.21.5: Kama hi, bho, anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, tesam viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa.
dn1:3.21.6: Yato kho, bho, ayam atta vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati, ettavata kho, bho, ayam atta paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti’ti.
dn1:3.22.2: ‘atthi kho, bho, eso atta, yam tvam vadesi, neso natthiti vadami;
dn1:3.22.3: no ca kho, bho, ayam atta ettavata paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti.
dn1:3.22.5: Yadeva tattha vitakkitam vicaritam, etenetam olarikam akkhayati.
dn1:3.22.6: Yato kho, bho, ayam atta vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati, ettavata kho, bho, ayam atta paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti’ti.
dn1:3.23.2: ‘atthi kho, bho, eso atta, yam tvam vadesi, neso natthiti vadami;
dn1:3.23.3: no ca kho, bho, ayam atta ettavata paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti.
dn1:3.23.5: Yadeva tattha pitigatam cetaso uppilavitattam, etenetam olarikam akkhayati.
dn1:3.23.6: Yato kho, bho, ayam atta pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti “upekkhako satima sukhavihari”ti, tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati, ettavata kho, bho, ayam atta paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti’ti.
dn1:3.24.2: ‘atthi kho, bho, eso atta, yam tvam vadesi, neso natthiti vadami;
dn1:3.24.3: no ca kho, bho, ayam atta ettavata paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti.
dn1:3.24.5: Yadeva tattha sukhamiti cetaso abhogo, etenetam olarikam akkhayati.
dn1:3.24.6: Yato kho, bho, ayam atta sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati, ettavata kho, bho, ayam atta paramaditthadhammanibbanam patto hoti’ti.
dn1:3.25.1: Imehi kho te, bhikkhave, samanabrahmana ditthadhammanibbanavada sato sattassa paramaditthadhammanibbanam pannapenti pancahi vatthuhi.
dn1:3.25.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va ditthadhammanibbanavada sato sattassa paramaditthadhammanibbanam pannapenti, sabbe te imeheva pancahi vatthuhi …
dn1:3.26.2: yehi tathagatassa yathabhuccam vannam samma vadamana vadeyyum.
dn1:3.27.1: Imehi kho te, bhikkhave, samanabrahmana aparantakappika aparantanuditthino aparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti catucattarisaya vatthuhi.
dn1:3.27.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va aparantakappika aparantanuditthino aparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti, sabbe te imeheva catucattarisaya vatthuhi …
dn1:3.28.2: yehi tathagatassa yathabhuccam vannam samma vadamana vadeyyum.
dn1:3.29.1: Imehi kho te, bhikkhave, samanabrahmana pubbantakappika ca aparantakappika ca pubbantaparantakappika ca pubbantaparantanuditthino pubbantaparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti dvasatthiya vatthuhi.
dn1:3.29.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va pubbantakappika va aparantakappika va pubbantaparantakappika va pubbantaparantanuditthino pubbantaparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti, sabbe te imeheva dvasatthiya vatthuhi, etesam va annatarena; natthi ito bahiddha.
dn1:3.30.2: ‘ime ditthitthana evangahita evamparamattha evangatika bhavanti evamabhisamparaya’ti.
dn1:3.30.3: Tanca tathagato pajanati, tato ca uttaritaram pajanati, tanca pajananam na paramasati, aparamasato cassa paccattanneva nibbuti vidita.
dn1:3.30.4: Vedananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimutto, bhikkhave, tathagato.
dn1:3.31.1: Ime kho te, bhikkhave, dhamma gambhira duddasa duranubodha santa panita atakkavacara nipuna panditavedaniya, ye tathagato sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti, yehi tathagatassa yathabhuccam vannam samma vadamana vadeyyum.

dn1:3.71.12: yepi te samanabrahmana pubbantakappika ca aparantakappika ca pubbantaparantakappika ca pubbantaparantanuditthino pubbantaparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti dvasatthiya vatthuhi, sabbe te chahi phassayatanehi phussa phussa patisamvedenti tesam vedanapaccaya tanha, tanhapaccaya upadanam, upadanapaccaya bhavo, bhavapaccaya jati, jatipaccaya jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
dn1:3.72.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati, ayam imehi sabbeheva uttaritaram pajanati.
dn1:3.72.2: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va pubbantakappika va aparantakappika va pubbantaparantakappika va pubbantaparantanuditthino pubbantaparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti, sabbe te imeheva dvasatthiya vatthuhi antojalikata, ettha sitava ummujjamana ummujjanti, ettha pariyapanna antojalikatava ummujjamana ummujjanti.
dn1:3.72.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dakkho kevatto va kevattantevasi va sukhumacchikena jalena parittam udakadaham otthareyya. Tassa evamassa: ‘ye kho keci imasmim udakadahe olarika pana, sabbe te antojalikata. Ettha sitava ummujjamana ummujjanti; ettha pariyapanna antojalikatava ummujjamana ummujjanti’ti;
dn1:3.72.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci samana va brahmana va pubbantakappika va aparantakappika va pubbantaparantakappika va pubbantaparantanuditthino pubbantaparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhimuttipadani abhivadanti, sabbe te imeheva dvasatthiya vatthuhi antojalikata ettha sitava ummujjamana ummujjanti, ettha pariyapanna antojalikatava ummujjamana ummujjanti.
dn1:3.73.2: Yavassa kayo thassati, tava nam dakkhanti devamanussa.
dn1:3.73.3: Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana na nam dakkhanti devamanussa.
dn1:3.73.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ambapindiya vantacchinnaya yani kanici ambani vantapatibandhani, sabbani tani tadanvayani bhavanti;
dn1:3.73.5: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ucchinnabhavanettiko tathagatassa kayo titthati,
dn1:3.73.6: yavassa kayo thassati, tava nam dakkhanti devamanussa,
dn1:3.73.7: kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana na nam dakkhanti devamanussa”ti.
dn1:3.74.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn1:3.74.2: “acchariyam, bhante, abbhutam, bhante, ko namo ayam, bhante, dhammapariyayo”ti?
dn1:3.74.3: “Tasmatiha tvam, ananda, imam dhammapariyayam atthajalantipi nam dharehi, dhammajalantipi nam dharehi, brahmajalantipi nam dharehi, ditthijalantipi nam dharehi, anuttaro sangamavijayotipi nam dharehi”ti.
dn1:3.74.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
dn1:3.74.6: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane dasasahassi lokadhatu akampitthati.
